body.p: This week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter carries news about added visual confirmation to the Forum user registration (needed because of recent mass registration attacks), an announcement for kernel version 2.6.10 being marked stable, and an outlook on some project goals for the next few months. Gentoo lectures at MIT, and a promising Gentoo LTSP project at a Canadian elementary school are in the international news section, and a handy tool for creating GUI menus in different window managers is being covered in the "Tips & tricks" column. And make sure you don't miss the article in last week's Linux Journal referenced in "Gentoo in the press"!
